directions: Mix 1 tablespoon of the soy sauce and 2 tablespoon of the wine; pour over shrimp; set aside to marinate. Make garlic stir-fry sauce: Whisk remaining 3 tablespoon soy sauce, remaining 2 tablespoon wine, 1 tablespoon of garlic, sugar and red pepper flakes; set aside. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat, about 4 minutes. Add 2 teaspoon of the oil and raise heat to high. When oil is hot, cook shrimp with marinade until shrimp is pink, about 1 minute; transfer to a plate. Add remaining 2 teaspoon oil to skillet, then snap peas, mushrooms and remaining 1 teaspoon garlic; stir-fry about 2 minutes. Stir in stir-fry sauce and shrimp; let mixture bubble about 1 minute. Serve over rice.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Shrimp and Veggie Stir-Fry
